select bai.id, bai.attr_name, bai.category_id, bai.category_level, bav.id bav_id, bav.value_name, bav.attr_id from base_attr_info bai inner join base_attr_value bav on bai.id = bav.attr_id and bai.is_deleted = 0 and bav.is_deleted = 0
(bai.category_id = #{category1Id} and bai.category_level = 1)
or (bai.category_id = #{category2Id} and bai.category_level = 2)
or (bai.category_id = #{category3Id} and bai.category_level = 3)
order by bai.category_level, bai.id, bav.id
